Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 070257 HAX, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project, located on Sites 23 and 31 within the Melrose Commons URA and Site 14A within the Mott Haven North, and the disposition of the city-owned property, Borough of the Bronx, Council Districts no. 16 and 17. This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to ยง197-c and ยง197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
